name: ThrombosesAtUnusualSitesICD10CMCodesForAEReporting
title: Thromboses at unusual sites, ICD10CM codes for AE reporting
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Thromboses at unusual sites definition of ICD10CM diagnosis codes, for potential identification of potential biologics-related adverse events.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element in the QDM category of Condition/Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Thromboses at unusual sites ICD10CM diagnosis codes. This includes intracranial and intraabdominal thromboses.),(Exclusion Criteria: Sequelae and chronic codes may be excluded.)

concept.display: Intracranial and intraspinal phlebitis and thrombophlebitis
Cerebral infarction due to cerebral venous thrombosis, nonpyogenic
Nonpyogenic thrombosis of intracranial venous system
Embolism and thrombosis of renal vein
Acute embolism and thrombosis of other specified veins
Cerebral venous thrombosis in pregnancy, unspecified trimester
Cerebral venous thrombosis in pregnancy, first trimester
Cerebral venous thrombosis in pregnancy, second trimester
Cerebral venous thrombosis in pregnancy, third trimester
Cerebral venous thrombosis in the puerperium
